mapper.insert: insert into loupan (id, name, type, left_count, count, address, current_sale_price, telephone, status, latitude, longitude, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentSalePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update loupan set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, left_count = #{leftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_sale_price = #{currentSalePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, left_count, count, address, current_sale_price, telephone, status, latitude, longitude, created_at, updated_at from loupan where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, type, left_count, count, address, current_sale_price, telephone, status, latitude, longitude, created_at, updated_at from loupan
select id, name, type, left_count, count, address, current_sale_price, telephone, status, latitude, longitude, created_at, updated_at from loupan where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
